name: Mizuki Shigeru no Youkai Butouden
overview: Mizuki Shigeru No Yokai Butouden is a fighting game based on the universe and characters created by this japanese manga author. The game features 8 different characters (based on Japanese demons like Tengu, Oni, Yurei, Kaiju, Kappa, and a snow ghost girl). - Kappa: is a type of aquatic yokai or water deity that inhabits the rivers in rural Japan. - Konaki-jiji is a yokai in the local folklore of the Tokushima prefecture in Japan. - Oni are creatures from Japanese folklore, variously translated as demons, devils, ogres or trolls. - Yuki-onna is a ghost or yokai found in Japanese folklore. - Tengu are mountain and forest goblins or yokai in Japanese mythology, sometimes worshipped as Shinto kami (revered spirits or gods). - Yurei are Japanese ghosts. The game have 2 modes: Story mode and a vs mode against another human player.
